content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 FIRST_ROW = 2,
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'datalake_lliu2usynapseworkspace_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [datalake_lliu2usynapseworkspace_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://datalake@lliu2usynapseworkspace.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.trip_data (
	[Trip ID] bigint,
	[Duration] bigint,
	[Start Date] nvarchar(4000),
	[Start Station] nvarchar(4000),
	[Start Terminal] bigint,
	[End Date] nvarchar(4000),
	[End Station] nvarchar(4000),
	[End Terminal] bigint,
	[Bike #] bigint,
	[Subscriber Type] nvarchar(4000),
	[Zip Code] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'RAW/BABS/SmallFiles/201508_trip_data.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [datalake_lliu2usynapseworkspace_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.trip_data
GO
